short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect MP4 Boxes from the DevTools!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to help you inspect mp4 video content and find irregularities in video streams.

After installing the MP4Inspector will show up as a new tab in your DevTools and offers the following features: 

- Inspect contents of mp4 boxes 
- Side-by-side mp4 box comparisons
- Filter by file name and/or mp4 box
- Download and concatenate segments
- View mp4 box contents as hex data

The MP4Inspector extension is open source and available on GitHub (https://github.com/bitmovin/MP4Inspector).
